films.title: Avengers: Infinity War
films.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.
films.title: Fast X
Top Gun: Maverick
films.description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to ...

films.title: Sherlock Holmes
films.description: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

films.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
films.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

films.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
films.description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

films.title: Skyscraper
films.description: A security expert must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 stories above ground, when his family is trapped inside by criminals.

films.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
films.description: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.
After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.
films.title: The Lion King

films.description: After barely surviving his grievous wounds from his mission in Dhaka, Bangladesh, Tyler Rake is back, and his team is ready to take on their next mission.
films.title: Extraction II
Iron Man 3
films.description: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
Ajax, a twisted scientist, experiments on Wade Wilson, a mercenary, to cure him of cancer and give him healing powers. However, the experiment leaves Wade disfigured and he decides to exact revenge.
films.title: Deadpool
Ride along 2
films.description: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

films.title: 21  jump street
films.description: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

films.title: Bullet train
films.description: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.

A hard-working, blue-collar dad just wants to provide a good life for his quick-witted 10-year-old daughter. His mundane San Fernando Valley pool cleaning job is a front for his real source of income: hunting and killing vampires.
films.title: Daya shift
